name: Hot Chef
description:
Made for Level Up Circle Jam

Play as the Chef who can only cook his food with PURE KINETIC POWER . The faster the Meatball the moves the hotter it gets and the hotter it gets the faster your score raises. However, if the Meatball slows down it'll freeze and that means GAME OVER. The longer the Meatball flies around the room at terminal velocity the higher the temperature gets and that increases your score faster.

Controls
WASD, arrows - Movement
Space bar - Jump
LMB - Underhand swing
RMB - Overhand swing

*hint:
LMB will generally hit upwards like an underhand swing and the reverse for RMB
